oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Joelton girls celebrate victory, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the victory of Joelton basketball players. The caption reads: “Happy, why not? Shows above are the victorious Joelton lassies who won the girls’ Seventh District basketball tournament last night. They are seen immediately after their conquest. Coach Mammy Bass, the gent on the right, is looking over his happy female cagers. Joelton defeated Cumberland, 37 to 25, in the finals.” Joelton is a suburb of Nashville, Tennessee, primarily in the northwestern portion of Davidson County. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bass, Mammy
